summary: Project includes a finance-focused app/site with a Blogs page containing 15 static Problem→Solution posts and a custom SVG favicon integrated into the HTML head.
architectural_notes: Blogs content will be implemented as static text on the Blogs page (no backend/dynamic blog system).
Favicon will be integrated using an SVG favicon file referenced in the HTML head.

existing_features.title: Update the existing Blog page route (/blog) to display 15 finance blog entries as static on-page content (brief Problem → Solution format) without fetching from the backend or running any default-content initialization.
Add the provided SVG favicon to the frontend public assets as /favicon.svg and wire it into the app HTML head so browsers use it as the site favicon.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 15 finance blogs as static text content on the Blogs page (Problem → Solution format, brief)
Add and wire up provided SVG favicon (favicon.svg) in the site/app HTML head

projectName: Add 15 static Problem→Solution blogs to Blog page and integrate provided SVG favicon
